WDY_CTLR_COMPOT.DESCRIPTION: Handling for Suspending and Resuming an Application
Error Handling by Application Before Navigation
Method for non-action specific operations before navigation
Method for Validation of User Input
Method for Modifying the View Before Rendering
Method for Modifying the Context Menu

WDY_CTLR_COMPO_SOURCE_VRS.SOURCE_LINE: DATA : IT_TAB TYPE TABLE OF ZTIME_REGISTER,
DATA : DAY_ATT TYPE TABLE OF CASDAYATTR ,
DATA: LR_NODE_INFO TYPE REF TO IF_WD_CONTEXT_NODE_INFO,
DATA: LV_NODE TYPE REF TO IF_WD_CONTEXT_NODE.
DATA LO_CMP_USAGE TYPE REF TO IF_WD_COMPONENT_USAGE.
DATA LO_ND_NODE TYPE REF TO IF_WD_CONTEXT_NODE.
DATA LO_EL_NODE TYPE REF TO IF_WD_CONTEXT_ELEMENT.
DATA LO_INTERFACECONTROLLER TYPE REF TO IWCI_SALV_WD_TABLE .
DATA LV_VALUE TYPE REF TO CL_SALV_WD_CONFIG_TABLE.
DATA LO_ND_NODE_ALV TYPE REF TO IF_WD_CONTEXT_NODE.
DATA LO_ND_DROPDOWN TYPE REF TO IF_WD_CONTEXT_NODE.
DATA LO_EL_DROPDOWN TYPE REF TO IF_WD_CONTEXT_ELEMENT.
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <DROPDOWN> via lead selection
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <DROPDOWN> via lead selection
SELECT SINGLE * FROM PA0105 INTO WA_PA0105 WHERE USRTY = '0001' AND USRID = SY-UNAME AND ENDDA = '99991231'."#EC CI_NOORDER
SELECT SINGLE * FROM PA0001 INTO WA_PA0001 WHERE PERNR = WA_PA0105-PERNR AND ENDDA = '99991231'."#EC CI_NOORDER
SELECT * FROM TEVEN INTO TABLE IT_PA2011 WHERE PERNR = WA_PA0105-PERNR AND LDATE >= BEG_DATE AND LDATE <= END_DATE and stokz = ''."#EC CI_NOORDER
delete adjacent duplicates from it_pa2011 comparing ldate satza.
LOOP AT IT_PA2011 INTO WA_PA2011 WHERE SATZA = 'P10'.
* READ TABLE DAY_ATT INTO W_DAY_ATT INDEX 1.
* CONCATENATE WA_PA2011-LTIME+0(2) ':' WA_PA2011-LTIME+2(2) ':' WA_PA2011-LTIME+4(2) INTO WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_1.
* CONCATENATE WA_PA2011-LTIME+0(2) ':' WA_PA2011-LTIME+2(2) ':' WA_PA2011-LTIME+4(2) INTO WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_2.
* READ TABLE IT_PA2011 INTO WA_PA2011_1 WITH KEY LDATE = WA_PA2011-LDATE SATZA = 'P20'.
* CONCATENATE WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+0(2) ':' WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+2(2) ':' WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+4(2) INTO WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_2.
* CONCATENATE WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+0(2) ':' WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+2(2) ':' WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+4(2) INTO WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_1.
* IF WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_1 IS NOT INITIAL AND WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_1 IS NOT INITIAL.
* ELSEIF WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_2 IS NOT INITIAL AND WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_2 IS NOT INITIAL.
* IF WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_1 IS NOT INITIAL AND WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_1 > '130000'.
* IF WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_2 IS NOT INITIAL AND WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_2 < '133000'.
READ TABLE DAY_ATT INTO W_DAY_ATT INDEX 1.
CONCATENATE WA_PA2011-LTIME+0(2) ':' WA_PA2011-LTIME+2(2) ':' WA_PA2011-LTIME+4(2) INTO WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_1.
CONCATENATE WA_PA2011-LTIME+0(2) ':' WA_PA2011-LTIME+2(2) ':' WA_PA2011-LTIME+4(2) INTO WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_2.
READ TABLE IT_PA2011 INTO WA_PA2011_1 WITH KEY LDATE = WA_PA2011-LDATE SATZA = 'P20'.
CONCATENATE WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+0(2) ':' WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+2(2) ':' WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+4(2) INTO WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_1.
CONCATENATE WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+0(2) ':' WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+2(2) ':' WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+4(2) INTO WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_2.
* IF WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_1 IS NOT INITIAL AND WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_1 IS NOT INITIAL.
* ELSEIF WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_2 IS NOT INITIAL AND WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_2 IS NOT INITIAL.
* IF WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_1 IS NOT INITIAL AND WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_1 >= '130000'.
* IF WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_2 IS NOT INITIAL AND WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_2 <= '133000'.
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <NODE_ALV> via lead selection
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <NODE> via lead selection
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <NODE> via lead selection
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <DROPDOWN> via lead selection
** navigate from <CONTEXT> to <DROPDOWN> via lead selection
* data lo_api_controller type ref to if_wd_view_controller.
* data lo_action type ref to if_wd_action.
DATA : IT_TAB TYPE TABLE OF ZTIME_REGISTER,

SELECT SINGLE * FROM PA0105 INTO WA_PA0105 WHERE USRTY = '0001' AND USRID = SY-UNAME AND ENDDA = '99991231'."#EC CI_NOORDER
SELECT SINGLE * FROM PA0001 INTO WA_PA0001 WHERE PERNR = WA_PA0105-PERNR AND ENDDA = '99991231'."#EC CI_NOORDER
SELECT * FROM TEVEN INTO TABLE IT_PA2011 WHERE PERNR = WA_PA0105-PERNR AND LDATE >= BEG_DATE AND LDATE <= END_DATE and stokz = '' ."#EC CI_NOORDER.
delete adjacent duplicates from it_pa2011 comparing ldate satza.
LOOP AT IT_PA2011 INTO WA_PA2011 WHERE SATZA = 'P10'.
READ TABLE DAY_ATT INTO W_DAY_ATT INDEX 1.
CONCATENATE WA_PA2011-LTIME+0(2) ':' WA_PA2011-LTIME+2(2) ':' WA_PA2011-LTIME+4(2) INTO WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_1.
CONCATENATE WA_PA2011-LTIME+0(2) ':' WA_PA2011-LTIME+2(2) ':' WA_PA2011-LTIME+4(2) INTO WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_2.
READ TABLE IT_PA2011 INTO WA_PA2011_1 WITH KEY LDATE = WA_PA2011-LDATE SATZA = 'P20'.
CONCATENATE WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+0(2) ':' WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+2(2) ':' WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+4(2) INTO WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_1.
CONCATENATE WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+0(2) ':' WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+2(2) ':' WA_PA2011_1-LTIME+4(2) INTO WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_2.
* IF WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_1 IS NOT INITIAL AND WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_1 IS NOT INITIAL.
* ELSEIF WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_2 IS NOT INITIAL AND WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_2 IS NOT INITIAL.
* IF WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_1 IS NOT INITIAL AND WA_TAB-CLOCKOUT_1 >= '130000'.
* IF WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_2 IS NOT INITIAL AND WA_TAB-CLOCKIN_2 <= '133000'.
